message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'd really enjoy. I'm asking for $140 for it, which I think is a fair price considering its value. Let me know what you think!
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me there?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping to get a little closer to my asking price.  Would you be willing to go up to $130? It's a great deal for both of us!
I understand you want to get closer to your asking price, but I'm still at $120. I'm not willing to go any higher. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
